S06bsu052_u:2_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena arhadbhikṣusahasreṇa,
S06bsu052_u:2_1: bodhisattvānāṃ ca mahāsattvānāṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhānāṃ paripūrṇairdaśabhirbodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sarvairavinivartanīyairanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu052_u:2_3: maitreyeṇa ca, asaṅgapratibhānena ca, anikṣiptadhureṇa ca, evaṃpramukhairdaśabhirbodhisattvaśatasahasraiḥ /
S06bsu052_u:3_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto 'ruṇodgatakālasamaye svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmat /
S06bsu052_u:3_1: upasaṃkramya vihārasya bahirdvāre sthito 'bhūttathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:3_2: athāyuṣmānapi śāradvatīputraḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāmadbhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:3_5: āyuṣmānapi mahākāśyapaḥ, āyuṣmānapi mahākātyāyanaḥ, āyuṣmānapi mahākauṣṭhilaḥ, anye ca mahāśrāvakāḥ svakasvakebhyo vihārebhyo niṣkramya yena bhagavato vihārastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:4_0: atha khalu bhagavānabhikrāntābhikrāntaṃ mahāśrāvakasaṃnipātaṃ viditvā svakādvihārānniṣkramya bahirdvārasyaikānte prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat /
S06bsu052_u:4_1_0: niṣadya ca bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma - kutastvaṃ
S06bsu052_u:4_1_1: śāradvatīputra kalyamevāgatya tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitaḥ? evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro
S06bsu052_u:5_0_0: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - satyaṃ kila
S06bsu052_u:5_0_1: tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ sarvaprathamataraṃ tathāgatavihāradvāre sthitastathāgatasya darśanāya
S06bsu052_u:5_0_2: vandanāya paryupāsanāya ca? evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat
S06bsu052_u:5_1: evametat sugata, prathamataramasmyāgataḥ svakādvihārānniṣkramya yena tathāgatavihārastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:5_2: upasaṃkramya ekānte sthito bhagavato darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya /
S06bsu052_u:5_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan atṛpto 'haṃ tathāgatasya darśanena vandanena paryupāsanena ca /
S06bsu052_u:5_4: yadapyahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamupasaṃkramāmi darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S06bsu052_u:5_5: tatsarvasattvānāmarthāya / sacedbhagavan (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 341) tathāgato draṣṭavyo vanditavyaḥ paryupāsitavyaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:5_6: evaṃ draṣṭavyaḥ, evaṃ vanditavyaḥ, evaṃ paryupāsitavyaḥ, yathāhaṃ paśyāmi yathāhaṃ vande yathāhaṃ paryupāse /
S06bsu052_u:5_7: evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca /
S06bsu052_u:5_8: ahaṃ ca bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:5_9: bhagavānāha - kathaṃ mañjuśrīstathāgato draṣṭavyo yāvat paryupāsitavyaḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - tathatākāreṇa tathāgataṃ paśyāmi avikalpākāreṇa anupalambhayogena,
S06bsu052_u:5_13: evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi / na tathatā bhavati na vibhavati,
S06bsu052_u:5_14: evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi / na tathatā deśasthā na pradeśasthā,
S06bsu052_u:5_15: evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi / na tathatā atītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06bsu052_u:5_16: evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi / na tathatā dvayaprabhāvitā nādvayaprabhāvitā,
S06bsu052_u:5_17: evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi / na tathatā saṃkliśyate na vyavadāyate,
S06bsu052_u:5_18: evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi / na tathatā utpadyate na nirudhyate,
S06bsu052_u:5_19: evaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi / evaṃ tathāgato dṛṣṭo bhavati vanditaḥ paryupāsitaśca /
S06bsu052_u:5_20: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - evaṃ paśyaṃstvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kiṃ paśyasi? mañjuśrīrāha - evaṃ paśyannahaṃ bhagavan na kiṃcitpaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:5_21: evamahaṃ paśyan na kasyaciddharmasyotpādaṃ paśyāmi na nirodhaṃ paśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:6_0: athāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - duṣkarakārakastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:6_2: yasya ca te sarvasattvānāmantike mahāmaitrī pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu052_u:6_3: na ca te kācitsattvopalabdhiḥ sattvābhiniveśo vā /
S06bsu052_u:6_6: sarvasattvānāṃ ca te kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:6_8: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - evametad bhadanta śāradvatīputra yathā kathayasi /
S06bsu052_u:6_10: na ca me kācit sattvopalabdhirvā sattvābhiniveśo vā /
S06bsu052_u:6_11_0: nāyaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra saṃnāha evaṃ saṃnaddhaḥ - kathamahaṃ sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ
S06bsu052_u:6_11_1: vā kuryāṃ pūrṇatvaṃ vā? sacedbhadanta śāradvatīputra parikalpamupādāya ekaikasmin
S06bsu052_u:6_12: ekaikaśca tathāgato gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhet sarātriṃdivaṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayamānaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:6_13: ekaikayā dharmadeśanayā yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukāsamairbuddhairbhagavadbhiḥ sattvā vinītāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:6_15: evamapi kṛtvā naiva sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu052_u:6_16: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvād bhadanta śāradvatīputra sattvadhātorna conatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu052_u:7_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadi mañjuśrīḥ sattvaviviktatvāt sattvāsattvāt sattvadhātornaivonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06bsu052_u:7_1_0: tatkasyedānīṃ bodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyasi? evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta
S06bsu052_u:7_1_1: āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - yadā tāvadbhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā
S06bsu052_u:7_3: Vaidya 342) kasya vā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyate? tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ /
S06bsu052_u:8_0: atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yadā tāvanmañjuśrīḥ atyantatayā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ,
S06bsu052_u:8_2: sacenmañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiyantaḥ sattvā iti,
S06bsu052_u:8_3: kiṃ tasya tvaṃ vadeḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yāvanta eva buddhadharmā iti /
S06bsu052_u:8_4: saced bhagavan punarapi pṛcchet - kiyatpramāṇaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:8_5: tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpramāṇo buddhaviṣayaḥ [iti] /
S06bsu052_u:9_0: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃparyāpannaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:9_1: kiṃ tasya tvaṃ vadeḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatparyāpannānutpādācintyatā [iti] /
S06bsu052_u:10_0: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarapi te mañjuśrīḥ kaścidevaṃ pṛcchet - kiṃpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti,
S06bsu052_u:10_1: kiṃ tasya tvaṃ vadeḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - tasyāhaṃ bhagavan evaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vadeyam - yatpratiṣṭhito 'nutpādadhātuḥ tatpratiṣṭhitaḥ sattvadhāturiti /
S06bsu052_u:11_0: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
S06bsu052_u:11_1: tadā kutra pratiṣṭhitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi? mañjuśrīrāha - yasminnahaṃ bhagavan samaye prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi,
S06bsu052_u:12_0: bhagavānāha - apratiṣṭhitasya te mañjuśrīḥ kā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā? mañjuśrīrāha - saiva bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kvacitpratiṣṭhānam /
S06bsu052_u:13_0: bhagavānāha - yasmin samaye tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayasi,
S06bsu052_u:13_1: kataratte kuśalamūlaṃ tasmin samaye upacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā? mañjuśrīrāha - na me bhagavan tasmin samaye kiṃcitkuśalamūlamupacayaṃ gacchati apacayaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:13_2: nāsau prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati yasya kasyaciddharmasya upacayo vā apacayo vā bhavati /
S06bsu052_u:13_4: yā kasyaciddharmasya upacayāya vā apacayāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu052_u:13_5: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmān jahāti,
S06bsu052_u:13_6: nāpi buddhadharmānupādatte / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā yaṃ dharmaṃ prajahyādupādadīta vā /
S06bsu052_u:13_7: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva saṃsāradoṣānupayāti na nirvāṇaguṇān /
S06bsu052_u:13_8: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan saṃsārameva tāvann samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu052_u:13_10: nirvāṇameva tāvannopalabhe, kaḥ punarvādo nirvāṇaguṇān drakṣyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:13_11: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yanna kasyaciddharmasyādānaṃ vā grahaṇaṃ vā niḥsaraṇaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:13_12: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya hānirvā vṛddhirvopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:13_13: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhagavan anutpādo hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu052_u:13_15: sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā / sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati vā nirodhayati vā /
S06bsu052_u:13_16: sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyonatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā karoti /
S06bsu052_u:13_17: yā bhagavan evaṃ bhāvanā, saiva prajñāpāramitābhāvanā /
S06bsu052_u:13_18: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitabhāvanā yā naivācintyān dharmān prārthayate na prādeśikān /
S06bsu052_u:13_19: api tu khalu punarbhagavan tadapi na saṃvidyate yatprārthayate,
S06bsu052_u:13_20: yena prārthayate, yatra prārthayate / evaṃ bhāvanā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā /
S06bsu052_u:13_21: evaṃ pratyupasthitā ime dharmā agrāḥ ime dharmā hīnā iti /
S06bsu052_u:13_22: nāpi tān dharmānupalabhate yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmagratā vā hīnatā vā syāt /
S06bsu052_u:13_24: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kaṃciddharmamagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā kalpayati /
S06bsu052_u:13_25: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhagavan anutpādasya kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā,
S06bsu052_u:13_26: bhūtakoṭyāḥ, yāvat sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidagraṃ vā hīnaṃ vā /
S06bsu052_u:14_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - na punarmañjuśrīḥ agrā buddhadharmāḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - agrāhyatvādbhagavan agrā buddhadharmāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:14_1: tatkiṃ punarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ? bhagavānāha - evametanmañjuśrīḥ śūnyāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:14_2: mañjuśrīrāha - tatkiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyā agratā vā hīnatā prajñāyate? bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:14_4: na punarmañjuśrīḥ anuttarā buddhadharmāḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - evametadbhagavan anuttarā buddhadharmāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:14_5: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan teṣvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:14_7: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na buddhadharmāṇāmārādhanāya saṃvartate na pṛgjanadharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartate /
S06bsu052_u:14_9: na saṃdhārayitrī / evaṃ bhāvanā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā /
S06bsu052_u:15_0: punaraparaṃ sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yā na kaṃciddharmaṃ cintayati na vijānīte /
S06bsu052_u:15_1: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ buddhadharmāṃścintayasi? mañjuśrīrāha - no bhagavan /
S06bsu052_u:15_4: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā kasyaciddharmasya vikalpena pratyupasthitā - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:15_5: ime śrāvaka dharmāḥ, ime pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ ime samyaksaṃbuddhadharmā iti /
S06bsu052_u:15_6: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tameva bhagavan dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kulaputro nopalabhate,
S06bsu052_u:15_8: śaikṣadharmān vā nirdiśet, aśaikṣadharmān vā nirdiśet, samyaksaṃbuddhadharmān vā nirdiśet /
S06bsu052_u:15_11: na bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktasya kulaputrasyaivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ kāmadhātuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:15_12: ayaṃ rūpadhātuḥ, ayamārūpyadhātuḥ, yāvad ayaṃ nirodhadhāturiti /
S06bsu052_u:15_13: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi sa bhagavan na kaściddharmaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:16_0: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 344) punaraparaṃ bhagavan eṣā sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasyopakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā karoti /
S06bsu052_u:16_1: na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā buddhadharmāṇāṃ dhātrī,
S06bsu052_u:16_3: eṣaiva sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjanadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:16_4: na buddhadharmāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ, na buddhadharmāṇāṃ pratilambhaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:17_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ yastvamimamevaṃrūpaṃ gambhīraṃ dharmaṃ deśayasi /
S06bsu052_u:17_1: sthāpitā te mañjuśrīriyaṃ mudrā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu052_u:17_2: ābhimānikānāṃ ca śrāvakāṇām, aupalambhikānāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ pratibodhāya /
S06bsu052_u:17_3: na te mañjuśrīḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā ekabuddhaparyupāsitā bhaviṣyanti naikabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:17_4: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu052_u:17_5: api tu khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ atikramya te buddhasahasrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:17_6: ye imaṃ gambhīraṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:18_0: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan bhūyasyā mātrayā prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:18_1: pratibhātu te mañjuśrīḥ, iti bhagavānasyāvocat / mañjuśrīrāha - eṣā sā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā na kasyaciddharmasya sthitimupalabhate nāsthitim /
S06bsu052_u:18_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nirālambanāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:19_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā draṣṭavyā yatra buddhadharmā api nābhimukhībhavanti kutaḥ punaḥ pratyekabuddhadharmāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:20_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā(yāṃ?) bhāvanāmāgamya acintyānapi buddhadharmānacintyā buddhadharmā iti na vikalpamāpadyate /
S06bsu052_u:20_1: seyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvadharmāvikalpāya draṣṭavyā /
S06bsu052_u:21_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā(yāṃ?) bhāvanāmāgamya sarvadharmān buddhadharmān paśyati,
S06bsu052_u:21_2_1: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante nottrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti
S06bsu052_u:22_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavan sā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā samanupaśyati /
S06bsu052_u:22_2: sā caiṣā bhagavan prajñāpāramitābhāvanā yā naiva pṛthagjananānātvaṃ karoti,
S06bsu052_u:22_3: na śrāvakanānātvam, na pratyekabuddhanānātvam, yāvat samyaksaṃbuddhanānātvaṃ ca karoti /
S06bsu052_u:23_0_0: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 345) atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma
S06bsu052_u:23_0_1: - kiyantastvayā mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatāḥ paryupāsitāḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - yāvanto bhagavan
S06bsu052_u:23_2_0: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - kaścitpunarbhagavan
S06bsu052_u:23_2_1: sa dharma upalabhyate yo na buddhadharmasaṃsthitaḥ? bhagavānāha - kasya punarmañjuśrīḥ
S06bsu052_u:23_2_2: ete buddhadharmāḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - bhagavan tava tāvadete buddhadharmā iti nāma na
S06bsu052_u:24_0: bhagavānāha - prāptā te mañjuśrīrasaṅgatā? mañjuśrīrāha - tadyadā tāvadahaṃ bhagavan na saṅgataiva,
S06bsu052_u:25_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ niṣaṇṇo 'si mañjuśrīrbodhimaṇḍe? mañjuśrīrāha - bhagavāneva tāvadbodhimaṇḍe na niṣaṇṇaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:25_1: kathaṃ punarahaṃ niṣatsyāmi bhūtakoṭiṃ pramāṇīkṛtya? bhagavānāha - bhūtakoṭiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - bhūtakoṭiriti bhagavan satkāyasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:25_2: bhagavānāha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - asanneṣa bhagavan kāyo na satkāyaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:26_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - niyatāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06bsu052_u:26_1: ye imaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyante notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu052_u:27_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - āsannībhūtāste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06bsu052_u:28_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - buddhā eva te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:29_0_0: atha khalu nirālambā bhaginī bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
S06bsu052_u:29_3: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan nirālambāḥ sarvadharmā asaṃvidyamānatvāt /
S06bsu052_u:30_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputramāmantrayate sma - evametacchāradvatīputra,
S06bsu052_u:30_1: evametat / niyatāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti bodhaye,
S06bsu052_u:30_5: Vaidya 346) śāradvatīputra pratiṣṭhitāṃstān kulaputrān kuladuhitaraśca jānīṣva,
S06bsu052_u:30_9: te te śāradvatīputra paramadānapatayo bhaviṣyanti mahādānapatayo viśiṣṭadānapatayaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:30_10: te te śāradvatīputra śīlasaṃpannā bhaviṣyanti paramaśīlavantaḥ paramaviśiṣṭaśīlaguṇapathaprāptāḥ,
S06bsu052_u:30_14: parameṇa vīryeṇa, paramairdhyānaiḥ, paramayā apratisamayā prajñayā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu052_u:30_15: te te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yāvat sarvakāravaropetena sarvajñajñānena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:31_0_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavan mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūmetadavocat - kaṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ arthavaśaṃ
S06bsu052_u:32_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:32_3: mañjuśrīrāha - labdha eva bhagavan dharmaḥ syāt,
S06bsu052_u:33_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīrimāṃ mama śrāvakasaṃpadam? mañjuśrīrāha paśyāmi bhagavan /
S06bsu052_u:33_1: bhagavānāha - kathaṃ paśyasi? mañjuśrīrāha - tathāhaṃ bhagavan paśyāmi yathā naiva pṛthagjanāna paśyāmi,
S06bsu052_u:34_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - yastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ śrāvakayānikānevaṃ paśyasi,
S06bsu052_u:34_1: samyaksaṃbuddhayānikān punastvaṃ kathaṃ paśyasi? mañjuśrīrāha - bodhisattva iti bhadanta śāradvatīputra nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu052_u:34_2: bodhāya saṃprasthita iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:34_3: bodhāya caratīti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:34_4: abhisaṃbudhyata iti nāma dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu052_u:34_6: śāradvatīputra āha - tathāgataṃ punastvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ kathaṃ paśyasi? mañjuśrīrāha - tiṣṭhatu bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahānāgaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:35_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - buddha iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - yatpunarbhadanta śāradvatīputra ucyate ātmeti,
S06bsu052_u:35_1: kasyaitadadhivacanam? śāradvatīputra āha - anutpādasyaitanmañjuśrīradhivacanaṃ yaduta ātmeti /
S06bsu052_u:35_4: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra apadādhivacanametad yadidamucyate buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:35_5: na hyetadbhadanta śāradvatīputra vācābhirvijñāpayituṃ buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:35_6: vāgapi bhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukarā nirūpayitum - iyaṃ vāgiti,
S06bsu052_u:35_7: kutaḥ punarbuddha iti / api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra yadevaṃ vadasi - kasyaitadadhivacanaṃ buddha iti,
S06bsu052_u:35_8: yo na samudāgato notpanno na nirotsyate,
S06bsu052_u:35_9: yo na kenaciddharmeṇa samanvāgato nāpyatra kiṃcitpadamabhedam,
S06bsu052_u:35_10: apadasyaitadbhadanta śāradvatīputra adhivacanaṃ yaduta buddha iti /
S06bsu052_u:35_11: tathāgataṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra paryeṣitukāmena ātmā paryeṣitavyaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:35_13: yathā ātmā atyantatayā na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu052_u:35_17: yatra na kācitsaṃkhyā, sa ucyate buddha iti / na caitadbhadanta śāradvatīputra sukaramājñātumātmeti yadadhivacanam,
S06bsu052_u:35_18: evametadbhadanta śāradvatīputra na sukaramājñātuṃ buddha iti yadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:36_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - nāyaṃ bhagavan mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastathā deśayati yathā ādikarmikā bodhisattvā ājānīyuḥ /
S06bsu052_u:36_1: evamukte mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhadanta śāradvatīputra tathā deśayāmi yathā kṛtāvino 'pyarhanta ājñāsyanti /
S06bsu052_u:36_4: nāpi saṃbuddhā, na dṛṣṭā, na śrutā, na smṛtā, notpāditā, na nirodhitā, noddiṣṭā, nopadeśitā / etāvadeva bhadanta śāradvatīputra yāvatā bodhiḥ /
S06bsu052_u:37_0: śāradvatīputra āha - na mañjuśrīrbhagavatā dharmadhāturabhisaṃbuddhaḥ? mañjuśrīrāha - na bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhagavatā dharmadhāturabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:37_1: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra dharmadhātureva bhagavān /
S06bsu052_u:37_4: api tu bhadanta śāradvatīputra sa eva dharmadhāturbodhiḥ /
S06bsu052_u:37_10: avijñaptikamiti bhadanta śāradvatīputra naitacchakyaṃ vijñāpayituṃ saṃskṛtatvena vā yāvad asaṃskṛtatvena vā /
S06bsu052_u:37_11: na tatra kācidvijñaptiḥ, tena tadavijñaptikam / sarvadharmā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra avijñaptikāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:37_12: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādurbhāvo nāsti yasmin sthitvā vijñapyeran /
S06bsu052_u:37_18: na apāyagāminaḥ, na parinirvāṇagāminaḥ / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi acintyaṃ gamanāgamanena pratyupasthitam,
S06bsu052_u:37_21: amūle te 'vasthitāḥ / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra anutpādasya mūlaṃ vā agraṃ vā iṣyate /
S06bsu052_u:37_24: adhikasamārope bhadanta sāradvatīputra caran loke dakṣiṇīyo bhavati /
S06bsu052_u:37_26: śrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:37_27: aśrāddho bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:37_28: kalpito bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurnārhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:37_29: akalpiko bhadanta śāradvatīputra bhikṣurarhati śraddhādeyaṃ paribhoktum /
S06bsu052_u:38_0: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - na samatā samupahatā,
S06bsu052_u:38_1: yā samatā saiva sā netrī / idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - asamupahatanetrīko bhikṣurarhan kṣīṇāsrava ityucyate /
S06bsu052_u:38_3: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - aṇūnyapi tasya bhayāni na saṃvidyante /
S06bsu052_u:38_4: tatkimuttariṣyati? idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - anuttīrṇabhaya iti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanamiti /
S06bsu052_u:39_0: śāradvatīputra āha - anutpannakṣāntika iti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - yena bhadanta śāradvatīputra aṇurapi dharmo notpāditaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:40_0: śāradvatīputra āha - avinīto bhikṣuriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - avinīto bhikṣuriti bhadanta śāradvatīputra arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:40_2: na vinayo vinītaḥ / idaṃ saṃdhāya bhadanta śāradvatīputra evaṃ vadāmi - avinīto bhikṣuriti arhataḥ kṣīṇāsravasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:41_0: śāradvatīputra āha - adhicitte caratīti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - adhicitte caratīti bhadanta śāradvatīputra pṛthagjanasyaitadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:41_1: śāradvatīputra āha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi? mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra so 'dhikaroti /
S06bsu052_u:42_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
S06bsu052_u:42_3: kṣīṇāsravo 'smi, na cārhan / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhadanta śāradvatīputra kṣīṇā me āsravāḥ ḥrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā /
S06bsu052_u:42_4: anena bhadanta ḥāradvatīputra paryāyeṇa kṣīṇāsravo na cārhan /
S06bsu052_u:43_0_0: (SaptaŚ, Vaidya 349) atha khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - syānmañjuśrīḥ
S06bsu052_u:43_0_1: paryāyo yadbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'bhavyo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
S06bsu052_u:43_0_2: mañjuśrīrāhasyādbhagavan paryāyaḥ yabdodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaḥ abhavyo
S06bsu052_u:43_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bodhāvaṇurapi dharmo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu052_u:43_3: sā ca bodhiranutpannā / tatra na kaściddharmaḥ saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu052_u:43_4: yo bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdet, yo vā bodhimabhisaṃbudhyet, yena vā bodhirabhisaṃbudhyeta,
S06bsu052_u:43_6: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa abhavyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu052_u:44_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - bodhiriti mañjuśrīḥ kasyaitadadhivacanam? mañjuśrīrāha - bodhiriti bhagavan pañcānāmānantaryāṇāmetadadhivacanam /
S06bsu052_u:44_1: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bodhiprakṛtikānyeva tāni pañcānantaryāṇi abhāvatvāt /
S06bsu052_u:44_6: te na kenacidabhisaṃbuddhāḥ, na dṛṣṭāḥ, na jñātāḥ, yāvat na viditāḥ / evameṣā bodhiḥ / api tu khalu punarbhagavan abhimānikaiḥ sthāpitānyetāni abhisaṃbudhāni(ddhā? ),
S06bsu052_u:45_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - kiṃ te mañjuśrīḥ mamāntike evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti? mañjuśrīrāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu052_u:45_1: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na me bhagavan evaṃ bhavet - tathāgato me tathāgata iti /
S06bsu052_u:45_2: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? [tathā caiva tathatā ca] yathā ca tathātā,
S06bsu052_u:45_3: tathā caiṣa tathāgataḥ / tathā hi bhagavan na tathatā tathāgataṃ vijñapayati,
S06bsu052_u:45_5: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan paramārthato 'bhāvā tathatā /
S06bsu052_u:45_6: abhāvastathāgataḥ / tasmāttarhi bhagavan na me evaṃ bhavati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti /
S06bsu052_u:45_7: api tu tathāgata iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātrametat /
S06bsu052_u:45_8: tat kataro 'sau tathāgato yatra me evaṃ bhaviṣyati - tathāgato me tathāgata iti? bhagavānāha - sa(tat?)saṃśayaste mañjuśrīstathāgate? mañjuśrīrāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu052_u:46_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - na tava mañjuśrīrevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgata iti? mañjuśrīrāha - syānme bhagavan utpannastathāgata iti,
S06bsu052_u:47_0_0: bhagavānāha - nādhimucyase tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ
S06bsu052_u:47_0_1: parinirvṛtā iti? mañjuśrīrāha - kaścit punarbhagavan ekaviṣayā buddha bhagavanto
S06bsu052_u:47_3: mañjuśrīrāha - kaścitpunarbhagavan etarhi tiṣṭhati? bhagavānāha - evametanmañjuśrīḥ /
S06bsu052_u:47_4: mañjuśrīrāha - tena hi bhagavan ete gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavanto na parinirvṛtāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:47_5: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan ekaviṣayā buddhā bhagavanto yadidamacintyaviṣayāḥ /
S06bsu052_u:47_6: na ca acintyatā utpadyate nirudhyate vā /
S06bsu052_u:47_7: tasmādbhagavan bhagavato vā abhisaṃbuddhena (ddhasya?) ye 'pi te anāgate 'dhvani tathagatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu052_u:47_8: abhisaṃbuddhā eva te / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? na hi acintyatā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
S06bsu052_u:47_10: prapañcayanti te bhagavan lokasaṃniveśaṃ yeṣāmevaṃ bhavati - utpannastathāgato yāvat parinirvāsyati veti /
S06bsu052_u:48_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - tena hi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ idaṃ tathāgatācintyam,
S06bsu052_u:48_1: acintyaṃ niścintyaṃ tathāgatasya vā agrata udāhārairudāhareḥ,
S06bsu052_u:48_2: avaivartikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vā arhato vā kṣīṇāsravasya /
S06bsu052_u:48_3: tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi te śrutvā naivānujñāsyanti,
S06bsu052_u:48_4: naiva pratikrokṣyanti / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi taccintyamacintyaṃ niścintyam /
S06bsu052_u:48_5: mañjuśrīrāha - acintyānāṃ niścintyānāṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ ko 'trānujñāsyati vā pratikrokṣyati vā? bhagavānāha - yathaiva mañjuśrīḥ tathāgato niścintyaḥ,
S06bsu052_u:48_7: mañjuśrīrāha - pṛthagjanā api bhagavan tathaiva niścintyāḥ? bhagavānāha - evametanmañjuśrīḥ /
S06bsu052_u:48_10: evaṃ pṛthagjanā api niścintyā iti? nanu bhagavan pṛthagjanatvamapi niścintyam /
S06bsu052_u:48_13: vihariṣyante te bhagavan / tatkasmāddhetoḥ? yaiva niścintyatā tadeva parinirvāṇam /
S06bsu052_u:48_16: ime āryadharmā iti, te idaṃ vacanīyāḥ - kalyāṇamitrāṇi tāvatparyupāsadhvam,
S06bsu052_u:48_17: tataḥ paścājjñāsyatha - ime pṛthagjanadharmāḥ ime āryadharmā iti /
S06bsu052_u:49_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam? mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan tathāgataṃ sarvasattvānāmagryam,
S06bsu052_u:50_0: bhagavānāha - icchasi tvaṃ mañjuśrīḥ tathāgatamacintyadharmasamanvāgatam? mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan tathāgatamacintyadharmasamanvāgatam,
S06bsu052_u:51_0: bhagavānāha - icchasi punastvaṃ mañjuśrīrevam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti? mañjuśrīrāha - iccheyamahaṃ bhagavan evam - ime śrāvakāstathāgatena vinītā iti,
S06bsu052_u:51_2: Vaidya 351) gacchet / na bhagavan buddhotpādaḥ kaśyacidupakāreṇa vā apakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitaḥ /
S06bsu052_u:51_3: taktasmāddhetoḥ? tathā hi sthita eṣa dhātuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:51_4: asaṃkīrṇa eṣa dhātuḥ, yaduta acintyadhātuḥ / tasmiśca dhātau na śrāvakanānātvam,
S06bsu052_u:52_0: bhagavānāha - na tvaṃ mañjuśrīrevamicchasi - anuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ tathāgata iti? mañjuśrīrāha - abhāvatvābhdagavan puṇyakṣetraṃ tathagataḥ,
S06bsu052_u:52_4: api tu khalu punarbhagavan nātra kaściddharmaḥ samudāgacchati na kṣīyate /
S06bsu052_u:52_5: evaṃ tatpuṇyakṣetram / tatra ca bījaṃ prakṣiptaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate /
S06bsu052_u:52_6: bhagavānāha - kiṃ saṃdhāya mañjuśrīrevaṃ vadasi - tatra kṣetre bījamavaropitaṃ na vivardhate na parihīyate iti? mañjuśrīrāha - tathā hi bhagavan acintyaṃ tatkṣetram,
S06bsu052_u:53_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ buddhānubhāvena ṣaḍvikāraṃ mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt,
S06bsu052_u:53_2: saptānāṃ bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ trayāṇāṃ copāsakaśatānāṃ catvāriṃśataścopāsikāsahasrāṇāṃ ṣaṣṭeśca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devakoṭīniyutaśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam /
S06bsu052_u:54_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsacīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumāṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S06bsu052_u:54_1_0: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmāntamānandametadavocat
S06bsu052_u:54_1_1: - ayamānanda puṇyakṣetranirdeśo nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ pūrvakairapi buddhairbhagavadbhirasminneva
S06bsu052_u:54_2: ayamānanda hetuḥ, ayaṃ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya /
